page.title: 17CLOSURE OF HONING SCHOOL
page.content: Honing school opened in 1872 and closed in 1985. On July 5th.1985 there was an open day. The weather was very hot. At 9.30am.there was a service in the parish church. The children sang, and played musical instruments including chime bars,fiddles,flute, recorders,guitar and fife. This was followed by an exhibition of village and school life through the ages at the school. There were displays of old photos and work. The walls were covered with pictures and murals made by the children,including a cardboard replica of a wherry. Staff who had been presented withgifts in church opened them at school. Each pupil was given a glass paperweight engraved with a view of Honing school. At about 6 o'clock there was a frightening thunderstorm, and lumps of ice broke three panes of glass.We went home at 7
